motor_translator.cpp File Reference

This nodes act as an interface between the dynamixel motor_controller and arm_us's control nodes. It take raw_position value from the motors and converts them into real angles. It also applies real word joint limits to sent commands (from arm_us) and add a motor speed limiter in cartesian control mode. More...

Detailed Description

This nodes act as an interface between the dynamixel motor_controller and arm_us's control nodes. It take raw_position value from the motors and converts them into real angles. It also applies real word joint limits to sent commands (from arm_us) and add a motor speed limiter in cartesian control mode.
